document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) of Serbia

; Ilić & Ćurčić 2013 ; Ilić et al . 2013 ; this paper).
Distribution. Europe, Russia , Mt. Caucasus, Transcaucasian area, Kazakhstan , Near East, Northern Africa.

Distribution in Serbia .
N (V), W, C, E, and S (including K) ( 2 ; 5 ; 9 ; 21–23 ; 62 ; 76 ; 80 ; this paper). Remarks. Sporadically found in Serbia . Usually collected on fallen trunks of deciduous trees and in wine traps. The most specimens were caught in montane forests with the domination of beech.

Distribution. Europe, Mt. Caucasus, Armenia , Iran , Northern Africa.
Remarks. Frequently found in Serbia . The hugher amount can be collected when present. Collected in both woodpiles and wine traps.

Distribution. Europe, Mt. Caucasus, Transcaucasian area,
Asia Minor
, Iran .
Remarks. Widely distributed and sporadically found in Serbia . Usually in woodpiles and on recently cut tree trunks in montane regions.

164 .
Xylotrechus ( Rusticoclytus ) pantherinus (Savenius, 1825 )
Examined material. None.

Distribution. Europe, Russia , Mt. Caucasus, Kazakhstan .
Distribution in Serbia .
